definition: to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅灯箱制作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顾客。

sentences.english: A. I’m not sure there’s a magic number, per se.
sentences.chinese: 本质上说，我不肯定是否有一个魔力数字。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: Some days must be dark and dreary.
sentences.chinese: 有些日子肯定幽暗而郁悒。

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: I'm one hundred percent sure he's falling in love with you.
sentences.chinese: 我百分之百肯定他爱上了你。

sentences.english: Song Di affirmative answer, let Tian Hongle on the day.
sentences.chinese: 宋迪之的肯定回答，让田宏乐上了天。

sentences.english: See my your ratify wanting to know current three major pcses were what?
sentences.chinese: 看到这里你肯定想知道现在的三大件是什么了吧？

sentences.english: The mother bear will see you across the lake and she'll want to hunt you.
sentences.chinese: 看到你，那头母熊肯定要捉你。

sentences.english: I can certainly picture being ill.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定能够想象自己生病。

sentences.english: I'm sure he'd really like me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他肯定会喜欢我的。

sentences.english: Look, he wears a red belt, so he must be a very good judoka.
sentences.chinese: 看，他系的是红带，所以他肯定是柔道高手。

sentences.english: The water has penetrated into the bedroom, so there must be a hole in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 水已经进入卧室，所以肯定在房顶上有洞。

sentences.english: But the sledding won't be smooth.
sentences.chinese: 但事情的发展肯定不会是一帆风顺。

sentences.english: This is the noumenon affirmation of the historical law.
sentences.chinese: 这是在本体论层面对历史规律存在的肯定。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
